title: Sensational 1st LeVeL, Just completed Contractor work, ALL UTILS INCL
posting_body: Very easy on the eyes 5 rooms plus bath.
WOW effect is in play as we see just installed:
Gourmet level kitchen with new counters, cabinets, appliances, gas stove, backsplash, tile work, et al.
Granite bath with high end finishes incl new sink and vanity.
Hardwoods in all rooms just got the full refinishing people look for--mirror like shine !
Top to bottom professionally done paint work with neutral tones.
Extra windows usher in exceptional levels of sunshine.
Easy 2 car parking at driveway.
Generous green space to be had.
If all this wasn't enough whats even nicer is the unique shapes and versatility of several of the rooms, esp the livroom.
ALL UTILITIES (heat/hw, electric, cooking) and parking are ALL INCLUDED to the number.
Laundry hook-ups at basement.
An all around Stunner!
No smoking please.
On pets 1 cat considered.
Start is now to August 15 latest.
Fee prop.
Corner property with fantastic views, light on both sides, just a mother load of fabulous features.
Challenges comparison today!
Call John Lambergs1, Ingram Realty
